INDICATOR_NAME: CO2 emissions from residential buildings and commercial and public services (% of total fuel combustion)
SOURCE_NOTE: CO2 emissions from residential buildings and commercial and public services contains all emissions from fuel combustion in households. This corresponds to IPCC Source/Sink Category 1 A 4 b. Commercial and public services includes emissions from all activities of ISIC Divisions 41, 50-52, 55, 63-67, 70-75, 80, 85, 90-93 and 99.
